document_data.name: ''Volo's Rejuvenating Ring''
document_data.creator: [[Elminster]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Volo's rejuvenating ring''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[ring]] created by [[Elminster Aumar]] for his friend [[Volothamp Geddarm]] some years before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: This small unassuming ring granted the wearer increased vitality and, once per day, the wearer could cast ''[[cure critical wounds]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the writer found himself swept away into a plot that crossed the merchant princess [[Sa'Sani]], with whom he was enamored, and an interloper [[deity]] from another world called [[Zehir]]. When the god's [[avatar]] was slain by a group of [[adventurer]]s who worked for Sa'Sani, Volo gifted them this magic ring as a gesture of a personal gratitude.
